modName: Intro music replacement - Becoming A Legend
summary: Replaces the intro menu music with John Dreamers Epic - Becoming A Legend
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]Firstly this music was NOT created by myself but John Dreamer through which I have permission via email to use for this purpose and on this site exclusively (at this time). If any Admin requires evidence of this please don\'t hesitate to message me! :D [/color]

As previously stated, this mod alters the main menu music to John Dreamers - Becoming A Legend.
There isn\'t much I can actually say that his song doesn\'t speak volumes for itself, check it out [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sZYjWPJ2PQ]here.[/url] I also highly recommend listening to his other music of the same Youtube account.

- Install with either NMM or manual copy paste into your data\\ folder.

You can find this song and more on [url=https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/john-dreamer/id438535782]itunes.[/url]
And [url=http://www.amazon.com/Becoming-a-Legend/dp/B008U75TDI/]Amazon.[/url]


Support the artist! :D
author: John Dreamer - Mod by Astalar

files.name: Intro music replacement - Becoming A Legend
